verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Now, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> O thou that art <S%H3427>situate<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3997>entry<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> which art a <S%H7402>merchant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>isles,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> O <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am of <S%H3632>perfect<s%> <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>
Thy <S%H1366>borders<s%> are in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> thy <S%H1129>builders<s%> have <S%H3634>perfected<s%> thy <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

They have <S%H1129>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy ship <S%H3871>boards<s%> of fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> of <S%H4480>Senir:<s%> <S%H8149><s%> they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%> from <S%H4480>Lebanon<s%> <S%H3844><s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8650>masts<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thee.

Of the <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H4480>Bashan<s%> <S%H1316><s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> thine <S%H4880>oars;<s%> the <S%H1323>company<s%> of the <S%H804>Ashurites<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> thy <S%H7175>benches<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory,<s%> brought out of the <S%H4480>isles<s%> <S%H339><s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim.<s%>

Fine <S%H8336>linen<s%> with embroidered <S%H7553>work<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> that which thou spreadest <S%H4666>forth<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H5251>sail;<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> from the <S%H4480>isles<s%> <S%H339><s%> of <S%H473>Elishah<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> that which <S%H4374>covered<s%> thee.

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon<s%> and <S%H719>Arvad<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> thy <S%H7751>mariners:<s%> thy <S%H2450>wise<s%> men, O <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> that <S%H1961>were<s%> in thee, were thy <S%H2259>pilots.<s%>

The <S%H2205>ancients<s%> of <S%H1380>Gebal<s%> and the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> in thee thy <S%H2388>caulkers:<s%> <S%H919><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with their <S%H4419>mariners<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> in thee to <S%H6149>occupy<s%> thy <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

They of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> and of <S%H3865>Lud<s%> and of <S%H6316>Phut<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> in thine <S%H2428>army,<s%> thy <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet<s%> in thee; <S%H1992>they<s%> set <S%H5414>forth<s%> thy <S%H1926>comeliness.<s%>

The <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H719>Arvad<s%> with thine <S%H2428>army<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and the <S%H1575>Gammadims<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> in thy <S%H4026>towers:<s%> they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> their <S%H7982>shields<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> round <S%H5439>about;<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> have made thy beauty <S%H3634>perfect.<s%> <S%H3308><s%>

Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> was thy <S%H5503>merchant<s%> by reason of the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> kind of <S%H1952>riches;<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H913>tin,<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> in thy <S%H5801>fairs.<s%>

Javan, <S%H3120><s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants:<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> in thy <S%H4627>market.<s%>
They of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> <S%H5414>traded<s%> in thy <S%H5801>fairs<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> and <S%H6505>mules.<s%>

The <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants;<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>isles<s%> were the <S%H5506>merchandise<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> they <S%H7725>brought<s%> thee for a <S%H814>present<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory<s%> and <S%H1894>ebony.<s%>

Syria <S%H758><s%> was thy <S%H5503>merchant<s%> by reason of the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of the wares of thy <S%H4639>making:<s%> they <S%H5414>occupied<s%> in thy <S%H5801>fairs<s%> with <S%H5306>emeralds,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and <S%H7215>coral,<s%> and <S%H3539>agate.<s%>

Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants:<s%> they <S%H5414>traded<s%> in thy <S%H4627>market<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> of <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> and <S%H6436>Pannag,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H6875>balm.<s%>

Damascus <S%H1834><s%> was thy <S%H5503>merchant<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of the wares of thy <S%H4639>making,<s%> for the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1952>riches;<s%> in the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2463>Helbon,<s%> and <S%H6713>white<s%> <S%H6785>wool.<s%>

Dan <S%H2051><s%> also and <S%H3120>Javan<s%> going to and <S%H235>fro<s%> <S%H5414>occupied<s%> in thy <S%H5801>fairs:<s%> <S%H6219>bright<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H6916>cassia,<s%> and <S%H7070>calamus,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> in thy <S%H4627>market.<s%>
Dedan <S%H1719><s%> was thy <S%H7402>merchant<s%> in <S%H2667>precious<s%> <S%H899>clothes<s%> for <S%H7396>chariots.<s%>

Arabia, <S%H6152><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> occupied <S%H5503>with<s%> <S%H3027><s%> thee in <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats:<s%> in these were they thy <S%H5503>merchants.<s%>

The <S%H7402>merchants<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants:<s%> they <S%H5414>occupied<s%> in thy <S%H5801>fairs<s%> with <S%H7218>chief<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
Haran, <S%H2771><s%> and <S%H3656>Canneh,<s%> and <S%H5729>Eden,<s%> the <S%H7402>merchants<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and <S%H3638>Chilmad,<s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants.<s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> were thy <S%H7402>merchants<s%> in all <S%H4360>sorts<s%> of things, in <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H1545>clothes,<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and in <S%H1595>chests<s%> of rich <S%H1264>apparel,<s%> <S%H2280>bound<s%> with <S%H2256>cords,<s%> and made of <S%H729>cedar,<s%> among thy <S%H4819>merchandise.<s%>

The <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> did <S%H7788>sing<s%> of thee in thy <S%H4627>market:<s%> and thou wast <S%H4390>replenished,<s%> and made very <S%H3513>glorious<s%> <S%H3966><s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Thy <S%H7751>rowers<s%> have <S%H935>brought<s%> thee into <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> thee in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

Thy <S%H1952>riches,<s%> and thy <S%H5801>fairs,<s%> thy <S%H4627>merchandise,<s%> thy <S%H4419>mariners,<s%> and thy <S%H2259>pilots,<s%> thy <S%H2388>caulkers,<s%> <S%H919><s%> and the <S%H6148>occupiers<s%> of thy <S%H4267>merchandise,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in thee, and in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H4658>ruin.<s%>
The <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of thy <S%H2259>pilots.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4880>oar,<s%> the <S%H4419>mariners,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2259>pilots<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H4480>ships,<s%> <S%H591><s%> they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%>

And shall cause their <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly,<s%> and shall cast <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> they shall wallow <S%H6428>themselves<s%> in the ashes: <S%H665><s%>

And they shall make themselves utterly <S%H7139>bald<s%> <S%H7144><s%> <S%H413>for<s%> thee, and <S%H2296>gird<s%> them with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and they shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> thee with <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>heart<s%> and <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>wailing.<s%>

And in their <S%H5204>wailing<s%> they shall take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> thee, and <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee, saying, <S%H4310>What<s%> city is like <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> like the <S%H1822>destroyed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea?<s%>

When thy <S%H5801>wares<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>seas,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> thou <S%H7646>filledst<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> thou didst <S%H6238>enrich<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H1952>riches<s%> and of thy <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

In the <S%H6256>time<s%> when thou shalt be <S%H7665>broken<s%> by the <S%H4480>seas<s%> <S%H3220><s%> in the <S%H4615>depths<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> thy <S%H4627>merchandise<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6951>company<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee shall <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thee, and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be sore <S%H8175>afraid,<s%> <S%H8178><s%> they shall be <S%H7481>troubled<s%> in their <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

The <S%H5503>merchants<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thee; thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1091>terror,<s%> and <S%H369>never<s%> shalt be any <S%H5704>more.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
